item.name: _Compendium Version Info
item.text: Includes: Custom Spells, Monsters, Classes/Subclasses, Items from Homebrew Campaign

feature.name: Thunderous Touch
feature.text: You can channel lightning through your hands.

feature.name: Wind Step
feature.text: You can move an extra 10 feet when taking the Dash action.

feature.name: Spirit Sight
feature.text: You can see into the Ethereal Plane up to 60 feet.

feature.name: Spirit Path
feature.text: At 2nd level, you choose a path: Path of the Ancestors or Path of the Beast.

feature.name: Ancestral Guidance
feature.text: You gain proficiency in History. You can cast Augury once per long rest.

feature.name: Spectral Shield
feature.text: Use your reaction to reduce damage to an ally by 1d10 + Wis mod.

feature.name: Feral Claws
feature.text: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 slashing damage.

feature.name: Bestial Vigor
feature.text: You gain resistance to poison damage.
